timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText:
See above: parameter should be of type ChecksInfo.
And do not add a second constructor since we need the same call for the IssueRecorder (which is used by the recordIssues step).
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.message: Pass around checksInfo, not checksName; support recordIssues

timeline.bodyText: This is not actually part of your PR: but since you added a simple way to verify the checks can you also add another test that does not wrap the code with withChecks and see that the original title is used?
